goal.ch: 課程目標(中文):本課程講述金融衍生性商品定價所需的數學模型與評價理論。首先介紹離散的二項樹模型，再拓展至連續的隨機動態模型。結合隨機微積分與無套利理論，探討風險中立測度下的資產定價與風險管理方法。
goal.en: This course describes the mathematical models and pricing theories for financial derivatives. We introduce the discrete binomial model and then extend the model to the stochastic continuous-time dynamics. Based on stochastic calculus and no-arbitrage theory, we discuss asset pricing theory and risk management methods under the risk-neutral measure.

outline.ch: 機率論、條件期望值、單期二項模型、多期二項模型、布朗運動、隨機微積分、無套利定價理論、平賭條件、測度轉換、希臘字母避險、評價模型應用。
outline.en: Probability Theory, Conditional Expectation, One-period Binomial Model, Multiperiod Binomial Model, Brownian Motion, Stochastic Calculus, No-Arbitrage Pricing Theory, Martingale Condition, Change of Measure, Greeks Hedging, Pricing Model Applications.
